position.name: position
position.appliesTo: all elements except table-column-group and table-column

top.name: top
top.percentages: refer to height of containing block
top.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a '<length>', the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a '<percentage>', the specified value; otherwise, auto.

right.name: right
right.percentages: refer to height of containing block
right.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a '<length>', the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a '<percentage>', the specified value; otherwise, auto.

bottom.name: bottom
bottom.percentages: refer to height of containing block
bottom.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a '<length>', the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a '<percentage>', the specified value; otherwise, auto.

left.name: left
left.percentages: refer to height of containing block
left.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a '<length>', the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a '<percentage>', the specified value; otherwise, auto.

offset-before.name: offset-before
offset-before.percentages: refer to height of containing block
offset-before.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a <length>, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a <percentage>, the specified value; otherwise, auto.

offset-after.name: offset-after
offset-after.percentages: refer to height of containing block
offset-after.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a <length>, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a <percentage>, the specified value; otherwise, auto.

offset-start.name: offset-start
offset-start.percentages: refer to height of containing block
offset-start.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a <length>, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a <percentage>, the specified value; otherwise, auto.

offset-end.name: offset-end
offset-end.percentages: refer to height of containing block
offset-end.computedValue: For position: relative, see Relative positioning. For position: sticky, see Sticky positioning. For position: static, auto. Otherwise: if specified as a <length>, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a <percentage>, the specified value; otherwise, auto.

<length>.prose: The offset is a fixed distance from the reference edge. Negative values are allowed.

<percentage>.prose: The offset is a percentage of the containing block’s width (for left or right) or height (for top and bottom). For stickily positioned elements, the offset is a percentage of the flow root’s width (for left or right) or height (for top or bottom). Negative values are allowed.

<integer>.prose: This integer is the stack level of the generated box in the current stacking context. The box also establishes a new stacking context.
